name: Bagaskaraa
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
I hope you are always healthy, don't abandon the positive things in yourself, especially worshipping Allah, and can stay away from negative things a little. 
 May our relationship get better, and what you wish for come true (like your wish to buy an iphone).
 I love you so much bububb! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy bubuubb...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special in My Life
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
